title: Love, Kennedy
overview: Kennedy Hansen is a funny, loving child but inexplicably she begins to fall. It takes years for the diagnosisâ€¦ Juvenile Batten Disease, an extremely rare, terrible and terminal prognosis. There is no cure for Batten Disease and after living only sixteen years, Kennedy leaves behind a great legacy of love and friendship. But her story doesn't end at her death, that's when the miracles really begin. Based on a true story.
